verses.verse: And it came to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of two full <S%H3117><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, that Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> dreamed <S%H2492><s%>: and <S%H5975><s%>, behold, he stood by the river <S%H2975><s%>.

And <S%H5927><s%>, behold, there came up out of the river <S%H2975><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> kine <S%H6510><s%>, well-favored <S%H4758><s%> and <S%H3303><s%> fat-fleshed <S%H1277><s%>; and they fed <S%H7462><s%> in the reed-grass <S%H260><s%>.

And <S%H7651><s%>, behold, seven other <S%H312><s%> kine <S%H6510><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> after them <S%H310><s%> out of the river <S%H2975><s%>, ill-favored <S%H7451><s%> and <S%H4758><s%> lean-fleshed <S%H1851><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the other kine <S%H6510><s%> upon the brink <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%>.

And the ill-favored <S%H7451><s%> and <S%H4758><s%> lean-fleshed <S%H1851><s%> kine <S%H6510><s%> did eat up <S%H398><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> well-favored <S%H3303><s%> and <S%H4758><s%> fat <S%H1277><s%> kine <S%H6510><s%>. So Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> awoke <S%H3364><s%>.

And he slept <S%H3462><s%> and dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a second time <S%H8145><s%>: and <S%H7651><s%>, behold, seven ears of grain <S%H7641><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> upon one <S%H259><s%> stalk <S%H7070><s%>, rank <S%H1277><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%>.
And <S%H7651><s%>, behold, seven ears <S%H7641><s%>, thin <S%H1851><s%> and blasted <S%H7710><s%> with the east wind <S%H6921><s%>, sprung up <S%H6779><s%> after them <S%H310><s%>.

And the thin <S%H1851><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> swallowed <S%H1104><s%> up the seven <S%H7651><s%> rank <S%H1277><s%> and full <S%H4392><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%>. And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> awoke <S%H3364><s%>, and <S%H2472><s%>, behold, it was a dream.

And it came to pass in the morning <S%H1242><s%> that his spirit <S%H7307><s%> was troubled <S%H6470><s%>; and he sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for all the magicians <S%H2748><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and all the wise men <S%H2450><s%> thereof <S%H6547><s%>: and Pharaoh told <S%H5608><s%> them his dream <S%H2472><s%>; but there was none that could interpret <S%H6622><s%> them unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.
Then spake <S%H1696><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> butler <S%H8248><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I do remember <S%H2142><s%> my faults <S%H2399><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>:

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was wroth <S%H7107><s%> with his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> me in ward <S%H4929><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%>, me and the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker <S%H644><s%>:

and we dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> night <S%H3915><s%>, I and he <S%H2492><s%>; we dreamed each man <S%H376><s%> according to the interpretation <S%H6623><s%> of his dream <S%H2472><s%>.

And there was with us there a young man <S%H5288><s%>, a Hebrew <S%H5680><s%>, servant <S%H5650><s%> to the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%>; and we told <S%H5608><s%> him <S%H6622><s%>, and he interpreted to us our dreams <S%H2472><s%>; to each man <S%H376><s%> according to his dream <S%H2472><s%> he did interpret <S%H6622><s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H6622><s%>, as he interpreted to us <S%H7725><s%>, so it was; me he restored unto mine office <S%H3653><s%>, and him he hanged <S%H8518><s%>.

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and they brought him hastily <S%H7323><s%> out of the dungeon <S%H953><s%>: and he shaved <S%H1548><s%> himself <S%H2498><s%>, and changed his raiment <S%H8071><s%>, and came in <S%H935><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, I have dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%>, and there is none that can interpret <S%H6622><s%> it <S%H8085><s%>: and I have heard say <S%H559><s%> of thee <S%H8085><s%>, that when thou hearest a dream <S%H2472><s%> thou canst interpret it <S%H6622><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, It is not in me <S%H1107><s%>: God <S%H430><s%> will give <S%H6030><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> an answer <S%H6030><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>.
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, In my dream <S%H2472><s%>, behold <S%H5975><s%>, I stood upon the brink <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%>:

and <S%H5927><s%>, behold, there came up out of the river <S%H2975><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> kine <S%H6510><s%>, fat-fleshed <S%H1277><s%> and <S%H3303><s%> well-favored <S%H8389><s%>: and they fed <S%H7462><s%> in the reed-grass <S%H260><s%>:

and <S%H7651><s%>, behold, seven other <S%H312><s%> kine <S%H6510><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> after them <S%H310><s%>, poor <S%H1803><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> ill-favored <S%H7451><s%> and <S%H8389><s%> lean-fleshed <S%H7534><s%>, such <S%H2007><s%> as I never <S%H3808><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> in all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for badness <S%H7455><s%>:
and the lean <S%H7534><s%> and ill-favored <S%H7451><s%> kine <S%H6510><s%> did eat up <S%H398><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> fat <S%H1277><s%> kine <S%H6510><s%>:

and when they had eaten them up <S%H935><s%>, it could not be known <S%H3045><s%> that they had eaten them <S%H935><s%>; but they were still <S%H4758><s%> ill-favored <S%H7451><s%>, as at the beginning <S%H8462><s%>. So I awoke <S%H3364><s%>.

And I saw <S%H7200><s%> in my dream <S%H2472><s%>, and <S%H7651><s%>, behold, seven ears <S%H7641><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> upon one <S%H259><s%> stalk <S%H7070><s%>, full <S%H4392><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%>:

and <S%H7651><s%>, behold, seven ears <S%H7641><s%>, withered <S%H6798><s%>, thin <S%H1851><s%>, and blasted <S%H7710><s%> with the east wind <S%H6921><s%>, sprung up <S%H6779><s%> after them <S%H310><s%>:

and the thin <S%H1851><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> swallowed <S%H1104><s%> up the seven <S%H7651><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%>: and I told <S%H559><s%> it unto the magicians <S%H2748><s%>; but there was none that could declare it to me <S%H5046><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, The dream <S%H2472><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> is one <S%H259><s%>: what God <S%H430><s%> is about to do <S%H6213><s%> he hath declared <S%H5046><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.

The seven <S%H7651><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> kine <S%H6510><s%> are seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>; and the seven <S%H7651><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> are seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: the dream <S%H2472><s%> is one <S%H259><s%>.

And the seven <S%H7651><s%> lean <S%H7534><s%> and ill-favored <S%H7451><s%> kine <S%H6510><s%> that came up <S%H5927><s%> after them <S%H310><s%> are seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and also the seven <S%H7651><s%> empty <S%H7386><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> blasted <S%H7710><s%> with the east wind <S%H6921><s%>; they shall be seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%>.
That is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which I spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>: what God <S%H430><s%> is about to do <S%H6213><s%> he hath showed <S%H7200><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.
Behold <S%H935><s%>, there come seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of great <S%H1419><s%> plenty <S%H7647><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>:

and there shall arise <S%H6965><s%> after them <S%H310><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%>; and all the plenty <S%H7647><s%> shall be forgotten <S%H7911><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and the famine <S%H7458><s%> shall consume <S%H3615><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>;

and the plenty <S%H7647><s%> shall not be known <S%H3045><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of that famine <S%H7458><s%> which followeth <S%H310><s%>; for it shall be very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3515><s%>.

And for that the dream <S%H2472><s%> was doubled <S%H8138><s%> unto <S%H6471><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, it is because the thing <S%H1697><s%> is established <S%H3559><s%> by <S%H5973><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, and God <S%H430><s%> will shortly <S%H4116><s%> bring it to pass <S%H6213><s%>.

Now therefore let Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> look out <S%H7200><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> discreet <S%H995><s%> and wise <S%H2450><s%>, and set <S%H7896><s%> him over the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

Let Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H6485><s%>, and let him appoint overseers <S%H6496><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%>, and take up the fifth part <S%H2567><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in the seven <S%H7651><s%> plenteous <S%H7647><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And let them gather <S%H6908><s%> all the food <S%H400><s%> of these good <S%H2896><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> that come <S%H935><s%>, and lay up <S%H6651><s%> grain <S%H1250><s%> under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> for food <S%H400><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%>, and let them keep it <S%H8104><s%>.

And the food <S%H400><s%> shall be for a store <S%H6487><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> against the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%>, which shall be in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; that the land <S%H776><s%> perish <S%H3772><s%> not through the famine <S%H7458><s%>.
And the thing <S%H1697><s%> was good <S%H3190><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all his servants <S%H5650><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his servants <S%H5650><s%>, Can we find <S%H4672><s%> such a one as this <S%H2088><s%>, a man <S%H376><s%> in whom <S%H834><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God is <S%H430><s%>?

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, Forasmuch <S%H310><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> hath showed <S%H3045><s%> thee all of this <S%H995><s%>, there is none so discreet and wise as thou <S%H2450><s%>:

thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> over my house <S%H1004><s%>, and according unto thy word <S%H6310><s%> shall all my people <S%H5971><s%> be ruled <S%H5401><s%>: only in the throne <S%H3678><s%> will I be greater than thou <S%H1431><s%>.
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%>, I have set <S%H5414><s%> thee over all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> took off <S%H5493><s%> his signet ring <S%H2885><s%> from his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%>, and arrayed <S%H3847><s%> him in vestures <S%H899><s%> of fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> a gold <S%H2091><s%> chain <S%H7242><s%> about his neck <S%H6677><s%>;

and he made him to ride <S%H7392><s%> in the second <S%H4932><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> which he had <S%H7121><s%>: and they cried before him <S%H6440><s%>, Bow the knee <S%H86><s%>: and he set <S%H5414><s%> him over all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, I am Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and without <S%H1107><s%> thee shall no man <S%H376><s%> lift up <S%H7311><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> or his foot <S%H7272><s%> in all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> Zaphenath-paneah <S%H6847><s%>; and he gave <S%H5414><s%> him to wife <S%H802><s%> Asenath <S%H621><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Poti-phera <S%H6319><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> of On <S%H204><s%>. And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>. And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and went throughout <S%H5674><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
And in the seven <S%H7651><s%> plenteous <S%H7647><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> brought forth <S%H6213><s%> by handfuls <S%H7062><s%>.

And he gathered up <S%H6908><s%> all the food <S%H400><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> which were in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and laid up <S%H5414><s%> the food <S%H400><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%>: the food <S%H400><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, which was round about <S%H5439><s%> every city <S%H5892><s%>, laid he up <S%H5414><s%> in the same <S%H8432><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> laid <S%H6651><s%> up grain <S%H1250><s%> as the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%>, until he left <S%H2308><s%> off numbering <S%H5608><s%>; for it was without <S%H369><s%> number <S%H4557><s%>.

And unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> before the year <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> came <S%H935><s%>, whom Asenath <S%H621><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Poti-phera <S%H6319><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> of On <S%H204><s%>, bare unto him <S%H3205><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the first-born <S%H1060><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>: For <S%H430><s%>, said he, God hath made me forget <S%H5382><s%> all my toil <S%H5999><s%>, and all my father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>.

And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> he Ephraim <S%H669><s%>: For God <S%H430><s%> hath made me fruitful <S%H6509><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of my affliction <S%H6040><s%>.
And the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of plenty <S%H7647><s%>, that was in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, came to an end <S%H3615><s%>.

And the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to come <S%H935><s%>, according as Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had said <S%H559><s%>: and there was famine <S%H7458><s%> in all lands <S%H776><s%>; but in all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> there was bread <S%H3899><s%>.

And when all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> was famished <S%H7456><s%>, the people <S%H5971><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> for bread <S%H3899><s%>: and Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto all the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>; what he saith <S%H559><s%> to you <S%H6213><s%>, do.

And the famine <S%H7458><s%> was over all the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> all the store-houses <S%H7666><s%>, and sold unto the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>; and the famine <S%H7458><s%> was sore <S%H2388><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And all countries <S%H776><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> grain <S%H7458><s%>, because the famine was sore <S%H2388><s%> in all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
